name: The Ultimate Campaign
description:
The Ultimate Campaign is a point-and-click puzzle game where you try and figure out the optimal placement of political agents throughout time.

Click different clues around the area to figure out people's political compasses and optimal location in time, and send them there to achieve your ultimate goal: Marxism.

Controls: Point and Click 

Geryongames: Programming, Art

Dragondoodler222: Music, Level/Character Design

Sound Effects from Licensed Stock Library
